summary: The diff modifies a repository file (project_state.json) and does not provide evidence of a rebuild/redeploy. It also introduces/request-tracks multiple additional features explicitly listed as non-goals, which conflicts with the BuildRequest constraint to republish without code changes or new features/UI changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the build and deploy/publish the currently deployed draft app to the Internet Computer without making any code changes (republish exactly as-is).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows an edit to project_state.json and contains no evidence of any build/deploy action or deployment output/accessibility. Additionally, a codebase change is present, which conflicts with the 'exactly as-is' constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: No source files (frontend or backend) are modified as part of this work.
missing_requirements.reason: A file in the repository was modified (project_state.json). While it may not be frontend/backend source, the acceptance criteria states no source files are modified; the diff provides no proof that frontend/backend sources were untouched, and it does show at least one repo change occurred.

missing_requirements.requirement: A new deployment is produced from the current codebase and is accessible for preview/publishing.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment artifacts, configuration changes, CI logs, or release-related changes are shown in the diff summary—only a project_state.json update.
The diff provides no evidence that user-facing text was verified/kept in English; it only updates internal project metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking/introducing requests for export/download of project code as ZIP.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal in the BuildRequest, and not required for REQ-3 republish-without-changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking/introducing a refactor to reduce file count to ~20–25.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal and contradicts 'Do not modify any existing source code'.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking/introducing data restore/migration to restore previously-entered days/tasks after publishing.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal and not part of REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking/introducing a 'Finish Day' locking feature request.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal and not part of REQ-3.
Explicitly listed as a non-goal and not part of REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking/introducing changes to Pomodoro task picker behavior (filter tasks by selected day).
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal and not part of REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Adding/associating unrelated requirement IDs (REQ-1, REQ-2) in new_feature_requests for deploy/publish items.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specifies REQ-3; introducing additional REQ IDs is not requested and may confuse traceability.
